meanings.sent1: I picked some mirabelles from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The mirabelles in the basket looked ripe and juicy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a mirabelle and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as a mirabelle on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The scent of mirabelles filled the air, enticing everyone nearby.

meanings.definition: A type of fruit tree bearing small yellow plums.
meanings.sent1: The mirabelles in the orchard were ready for harvest.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted a new mirabelle next to the apple tree.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily in the mirabelle tree.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the mirabelle tree reached towards the sky like outstretched arms.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the mirabelle tree danced in the gentle breeze, shimmering in the sunlight.
